2:
How long will you judge unjustly
\q and show favoritism to the wicked?
\qs Selah\qs*
4:
Rescue the poor and needy;
\q take them out of the hand of the wicked.
6:
I said, "You are gods,
\q and all of you sons of the Most High.
\q
7:
Nevertheless you will die like men
\q and fall like one of the princes."
8:
Arise, God, judge the earth,
\q for you have an inheritance in all the nations.
